item.title: Fingerprint recognition, Python, Tkinter
item.description: A biometric fingerprint recognition system is organized into four main stages: fingerprint input, feature extraction of fingerprints, comparison stage with the fingerprint set from the database (1:N type comparisons), and the final stage of deciding whether there is a match with a record in the dataset. link to the project on github The following figure shows the logical scheme and structure of the project. It also illustrates the addition of a new fingerprint to the database and the deletion of a record.
